text: Score Condition 1 Myocardial infarct, congestive heart failure, peripheral vascular disease, dementia, cerebrovascular disease, chronic lung disease, connective tissue disorder, peptic ulcer, liver disease, diabetes 2 Hemiplegia, moderate or severe kidney disease, diabetes with end organ damage, non metastatic tumour, leukaemia, lymphoma 3 Moderate or severe liver disease 6 Metastatic tumour, AIDS Score: < 3 have a greater than 90% chance of 1-year survival. Score: 3-8 has a 50-90% chance of survival. Score: > 8 has a 50% chance of 1-year survival.
